All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BlissAPBot
A Discord bot for managing the Activity Points System on ARK Bliss.
CommandManager
Manages all the commands associated with the BlissAPBot.
Database
Manages the Database for BlissAPBot following the singleton design pattern.
GetAllPlayers
Retrieves all the players registered to the AP System.
GetPlayerInfo
Gets the values of all fields for a specific player.
GetPlayersByMap
Gets all the players registered to the AP System by a provided map.
InvalidGamertagException
Creates an exception for if the Gamertag provided by the player is invalid.
InvalidNameException
Creates an exception for if the Username provided by the player is invalid.
InvalidTribeNameException
Creates an exception for if the Tribe Name is invalid.
MarkSeen
Marks a player as seen in the AP System.
Player
Creates a new Player to be stored in the AP System database.
Player.PlayerStates
Contains the possible states that a Player can be in determined on if they are currently playing on Bliss or not.
PlayerList
Manages the List of Players for the BlissAPBot.
Register
The backend functionality of the /register command.
Remove
Removes a player from the AP System.
